name: Vitale #9
description: Your 2.00 carat emerald cut natural diamond is a remarkable gemstone with specific attributes that contribute to its beauty and value. Its VS2 clarity, very small inclusions, is combined with an exceptional white E colour, resulting in a captivating sparkle accentuated by its precise cut. The step-cut faceting style of the emerald cut creates a hall-of-mirrors effect, producing flashes of light and emphasising the clarity of your diamond. Impeccably graded and crafted, this diamond promises timeless beauty and investment potential.
